Inside Macintosh: Cyberdog Programmer's Kit / Part 3 - Cyberdog Reference
Chapter 6 - Types, Constants, and Global Functions / Types and Constants
Cyberdog Items

Script Code

A ScriptCode data type is a 16-bit value that identifies the script system (Roman, for example) to be used to draw a text string.
